channel.title: production on Josiah Parry
channel.description: Recent content in production on Josiah Parry

item.title: APIs: the language agnostic love story
item.description: Extending the love story through design choices You may have noticed by now that we at RStudio have been emphatic about the R & Python love story.

item.title: Python & R in production — the API way
item.description: In my previous post I discussed how we can alter the R & Python story to be predicated on APIs as a way to bridge the language divide.

item.title: Medium Data and Production API Pipeline
item.description: “[P]arsing huge json strings is difficult and inefficient.”1 If you have an API that needs to receive a large amount of json, sending that over will be slow.
